entry.title: MINI BLESSED VIRGIN MARY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: Necklace
Price: 2200.00

Religious enamel pendants with Madonnas and Patron Saints. We paint using ceramic pigments following traditional practices and employing the Limoges enamel technique of jewelry. Each piece is fired in a kiln at 800 Degrees Celsius. Our medals are set in 18K solid Yellow Gold Frame and set with precious and semi precious stones along with an inscription in black along the rear side. 
  • 18-karat yellow gold pendant
  • Small hand painted enamel Blessed Virgin Mary medal 
  • Measurement 12mm wide by 16mm long 
  • Set with 0.52 ctw yellow sapphire round
  • Set with 0.28 ctw pink diamonds
  • Ships in 2 to 3 weeks

entry.title: Colette X Muzo Price on demand
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: Necklace
Price: 110000.00

As part of a collaboration with Muzo Emeralds, the Colette x Muzo necklace is a variation on Colette’s signature Penacho designs, created as an homage to her Mexican heritage.

Infusing striking Aztec-inspired design with Muzo’s vibrant Colombian emeralds, the necklace captures the richness of Latin American culture. 

  • 18K White Gold
  • 5.7 ctw Onyx
  • 5.7 ctw Malachite
  • 3.90 ctw WDia
  • 6.48 ctw Emerald from Columbia

entry.title: Penacho Queen Necklace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: Necklace
Price: 42000.00

Penacho Queen Necklace

Penacho is inspired by Colette’s Mexican heritage, paying homage to Aztec culture. In creating this vibrant collection, Colette looked to traditional Aztec regalia, and was influenced by the importance of feathers in Aztecan headdresses. Traditional headdresses are made with vibrant feathers, similar to that of a hummingbird.  Huitzilopochtli, translating to “Hummingbird of the Left”, is the God of sun and war.  Aztecs believed that warriors who lost their lives in battle would return as hummingbirds.  Colette carefully selected hard stones such as malachite, lápiz lazuli, onyx, mother of pearl and diamonds for the foundation of this collection. Set in 18-karat gold, Penacho brings to life the beauty of the Mexican and Aztec culture.

  • 18-karat white gold
  • Set with 3.96 ctw white diamonds
  • Malachite
  • Lapis
  • Opens with two side hinges
  • Sits comfortably on the collar bone
  • Total weight 110 grams 
  • Brilliant Cut
  • Color H-G
  • Clarity VS1-VS2
  • Conflict free diamonds
  • Ships in 4 to 6 weeks

entry.title: Penacho Heart Pendant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: Necklace
Price: 17620.00

Penacho Heart Pendant 

Colette pays homage to her Mexican heritage with her Penacho collection. Inspired by the headdresses of Aztecan warriors who worshiped god of sun and war Huitzilopochtl, whose name translates to “hummingbird of the left,” Colette uses meticulously cut lapis lazuli, malachite, and onyx set with diamonds in 18 karat gold.

Emulating the vibrancy of the ancient headdress’ feathers, the collection’s striking silhouettes elicit a feeling of the Aztecan warrior’s fearlessness, and convey that with beauty there is endless power.

    • 18-karat yellow gold 
    • Set with 0.30 ctw white diamond
    • Measurements 1.7 cm diameter 
    • Chain made with White Diamonds and Onyx hardstone
    • Brilliant Cut
    • Color H-G
    • Clarity VS1-VS2
    • Conflict free diamonds

  • set with 0.40 ctw white diamond
  • Enamel
  • Chain Length 16 "
  • Brilliant cut
  • Color H-G
  • Clarity VS1-VS2
  • conflict free diamonds
  • Available Colors 
  • Bubble Gum Pink, Lavender, White, Baby Blue, Royal Blue, Turquoise, Emerald Green, Burgundy, Neon Pink, Neon Green, Red, Black, Orange, Purple, Fuchsia
  • Ships in 2 to 3 weeks

 

Enamel Technique:

The Enamel used on our pieces is a type of allochromatic glass that consists usually of quartz sand, iron oxide, potassium oxide (potash) and borax (flux). These components form a transparent and colorless fondant after firing at temperatures between 700 and 900 degrees Celsius. Their plethora of colors are established by addition of different metal oxides and/or chlorides. After thoroughly crushing and washing these materials a hydrated mass is formed (a fondant) which is then applied on a suitable, and completely clean metal.

entry.title: Double Sided Zodiac Pendant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Colette Jewelry
Type: Necklace
Price: 2805.00

Aquarius Double Sided Pendant 

January 21 - February 19

You are a true original, with a forward-thinking nature often misunderstood by those around you. You are witty and humanitarian, and you love a good academic debate. But you can also be aloof, stubborn, and rebellious when dealing with others whom you feel are not at your intellectual level. Don't let those qualities get the best of you. 

  • 18-karat yellow gold

  • Set with 0.11 ctw white diamonds (front)
  • Set with 0.17 ctw white diamonds (back)

Cosmo Mooncage Necklace

Our signature Galaxia collection features a wide spectrum of styles designed to intrigue anyone feigning interest in the Cosmos. Embellished with black and white diamonds, pearls and moonstones, this collection uses many of Earths stunning materials to reflect the galaxy surrounding us. As vast as the universe may be, all of us must remember that we are amongst the stars.
